body_html: Turns out that the error was caused by the 'checkpoint' file not being downloaded. Apart from the 3 files of .meta, .index and .data-00000-of-00001 file, the other saved file named 'checkpoint' too needs to be downloaded. Keeping this here in case another person faces the same issue.

body: Turns out that the error was caused by the 'checkpoint' file not being downloaded. Apart from the 3 files of .meta, .index and .data-00000-of-00001 file, the other saved file named 'checkpoint' too needs to be downloaded. Keeping this here in case another person faces the same issue.
